Navigation.pwd: Print the name of the current working directory
Navigation.tree: List contents of directories in a tree-like format

File Operations.touch: Change file timestamps or create new files

File Viewing.less: View file content with backward navigation
File Viewing.head: Output the first part of files
File Viewing.tail: Output the last part of files

File Editing.cut: Remove sections from each line of files
File Editing.sed: Stream editor for filtering and transforming text

File Permissions.chmod: Change file mode bits, as in read, write, execute

Search.find: Search for files in a directory hierarchy
Search.which: Shows the full path of (shell) commands
Search.tree: List contents of directories in a tree-like format

System and Process Management.ps: Report a snapshot of the current processes
System and Process Management.systemctl: Controls the systemd system and service manager

Disk Usage.df: Report file system disk space usage
Disk Usage.du: Estimate file and directory space usage

Networking.ping: Send ICMP ECHO_REQUEST to network hosts
Networking.ifconfig: Display or configure a network interface

System Information.hostname: Show or set the system's host name
System Information.whoami: Print the user name associated with the current effective user ID
System Information.id: Print real and effective user and group IDs

User Management.useradd: Create a new user or update default new user information
User Management.userdel: Delete a user account and related files
User Management.groupmod: Modify a group definition on the system
